title: Protecting His Best Friend's Daughter: A forbidden love age gap romance (Sunset Security Book 4)
features: Twenty years of military discipline hasn’t prepared me for one weekend with Amy…

Amy’s the perfect woman. Sweet, funny, and curves that make my mouth water. Too bad she’s my best friend’s daughter and completely off-limits.When he asks me to protect her, he has no idea how far I’ll go to keep her safe.Amy may be forbidden to me, but I won’t let any other man touch her.

It’s only ever been Leo. Since he made me laugh when I was twelve years old, I’ve had a crush on him.But he still sees me as a little girl.When we’re thrown together for the weekend, it’s my chance to show him I’m more than a little girl. I’m a woman—his woman.He thinks we should do the right thing. He thinks we can’t be together.Leo has a will of steel, and I’m determined to break him…
is a forbidden love, age gap, romance featuring an OTT ex-military hero and the curvy woman he claims as his own.
is part of the Sunset Security series and set in the Sunset Coast world. Every story is a stand-alone, but best enjoyed together. No cliffhangers and always with a happily ever after.
Authors note: Protecting His Best Friend's Daughter is a steamy instalove novella that can be read in about two hours. If you love a quickie, then dive on in!
description: I write short stories about badass alpha males and the saucy women who steal their hearts. My books are short, steamy and always with a happily ever after.
